intro_text: Once upon a time , a collection of five books telling the stories of a great hero named Henry Potter.
All the world's children loved the stories of this young teenager.
The editor of this collection, in a huge act of generosity, decided to put in place a system that applies commercial offers as random as the spells of Ron Weasley.
